data.name: Grand Theft Gato: Vice Kitty Demo
data.detailed_description:
Other games from Letmeowt Games

Cat Gets Medieval
[url][/url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/1527060/Cat_Gets_Medieval/
Cat Saves Halloween
[url][https://store.steampowered.com/app/1444320/Cat_Saves_Halloween/url]


About the Game

Play as a cat in this open world of Kitty City of Vice. You get to drive around like crazy with RPG elements while wielding a backpack full of weapons. Who is the Purrlice? Who is the Meowfia? Explore the city to find out more about these two groups of cats. Bring some friends or go solo. If you love this demo then wishlist our game to see what more you can discover about this cute game.
data.about_the_game: Play as a cat in this open world of Kitty City of Vice. You get to drive around like crazy with RPG elements while wielding a backpack full of weapons. Who is the Purrlice? Who is the Meowfia? Explore the city to find out more about these two groups of cats. Bring some friends or go solo. If you love this demo then wishlist our game to see what more you can discover about this cute game.
data.short_description: Be a cat that gets to drive cars, scale buildings, steals, gets into back-alley fights, shoot out of cannons, or upholds the cat laws. Kitty City of Vice is an open world waiting to be explored. Bring some friends or go solo. Which side will you choose after playing the demo? Purrlice? Meowfia?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
